xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnFinancialR: Notes to Financial Results: 1. The following ratios which form part of the Standalone Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December, 2023, are reproduced below, as there are no rows designated for the same in the XBRL format: Ratio Quarter ended Nine Months ended 31st December, 2023 31st December, 2023 A) Current ratio 1.27 1.27 B) Long Term Debt to Working Capital 2.36 2.36 C) Bad Debts to Account Receivable Ratio 0.00 0.00 D) Current Liability Ratio 0.51 0.51 E) Total Debt to Total Assets 0.22 0.22 F) Debtors Turnover Ratio $ 21.31 25.63 G) Inventory Turnover Ratio $ 6.38 6.58 H) Operating Margin (%) 9.5 10.0 I) Net Profit Margin (%) 7.3 7.4 $ Ratios for the quarter / nine months have been annualised. 2. Net Worth as at 31st December 2023 is Rs. 457,070 Crore. 3. Outstanding Capital Redemption Reserve/Debenture Redemption Reserve as at 31st December 2023 is Rs. 1,683 Crore.
xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnSegmentsEx: 1. Q3 FY24 Segment Revenue includes Rs 5,504 crore GST recovered. Net Revenue is Rs 130,579 crore. 2. 9M FY24 Segment Revenue includes Rs 18,722 crore GST recovered. Net Revenue is Rs 396,928 crore. 3. Oil to Chemicals Segment results includes Interest income/Other Income pertaining to it's segment.
